ack.p: The first author is thankful to the UGC, Government of India for providing Junior Research Fellowship [File no: F. 2-14/2012(SA-I)] to pursue Ph.D. Authors are also grateful to Dr. K. Jayathilakan and Dr. M.C. Pandey, Freeze Drying and Processing Technology Division, Defence Food Research Laboratory, Mysuru, India, for providing the γ–radiation facility. The authors are also thankful to Director, DFRL, and DRDO-BU-CLS for their kind support.
